attributes.action: Cancel Company VAT returns during Covid 19 out break
attributes.additional_details: Business turn over will be down for most companies during this out break, particularly if the country enters a lock down period. Businesses have huge over heads in modern times, not to mention huge wage roles to cover and this would help quickly and swiftly.
attributes.background: Cancel Business Vat returns for the next 2 quarters to help ensure employee wages are covered and to help towards other business costs. This would be a direct and easily actioned reaction, which would show full support to the economy, both employee and employer wise.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304245

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
